title: NBA All-Star Weekend: Stars prepare for main event; LeBron James to sit out
description: Here are the live updates and highlights from NBA All-Star Weekend 2025 in the Bay Area.
author: ESPN staff

title: LeBron out for All-Star Game, ending 20-year run
description: Lakers star LeBron James will not play in the NBA All-Star Game on Sunday night because of lingering discomfort in his left foot and ankle.
author: Dave McMenamin

title: 'Everyone gets nervous' - what title race looks like after Liverpool win
description: The Premier League title race is heading towards the final straight - after Liverpool edged past Wolves, how does their run-in compare to Arsenal's?

title: 'My job is so hard' - Amorim frustrated as Man Utd lose again
description: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim says his job is "so hard" after defeat at Tottenham on Sunday leaves his side 15th in the Premier League.

title: Live updates: NBA All-Star Game with new tourney-style format
description: The 74th NBA All-Star Game is trying something different after the lackluster games of recent years, with four teams competing for a cash prize.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Sources: SEC, Big Ten building momentum to further expand College Football Playoff to 14 or 16 teams
description: The conferences are pushing to assign multiple automatic qualifiers per league, with as many as four each for themselves. In short, a plethora of changes are on the table.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Man City rediscover flair as Merino steps up for Arsenal
Wolves frustrated after Liverpool's Konate avoids red card
description: Wolves boss Vitor Pereira was left frustrated with the decision not to send Ibrahima Konate off for two yellow cards in his side's 2-1 defeat at Liverpool.
